Articles.Content:
I moved this thread to fanworks because i am a fan of the KSP

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/26503-I-need-something-to-do-with-this?p=322960#post322960

Edited April 28, 2013 by rewdew2

Cool. Any alpha releases to the public?

I can help with the scripting aspect of blender a bit, if you want.

Cool. Any alpha releases to the public?

I can help with the scripting aspect of blender a bit, if you want.

Not sure if i need scripting done right now, but maybe later.

Right now one of the things i need is someone who can help me figure a plot for it...
I love the concept, but I would never play it *shrug* shooting games aren't for me.

I love the concept, but I would never play it *shrug* shooting games aren't for me.

But, but, it's made by a fellow kerballer!

But, but, it's made by a fellow kerballer!

Well, it's just not his cup-O-tea, it's okay.

It was just a small project i threw together and i thought the forums would like.

But if any of you could give me an idea of what kind of game i could make with this, that would be great.

Mass Effect kind of thing, customization is the best aspect any game can have, be it pac-man or Skyrim.

But yeah, anything with heaps of customization I'll be all over.

Well, it's in blender so if you know logic editing, you can edit it.

But really, i badly need an idea of what to do with this game... Because this is like a base, and i can change the maps easily

Well, it's just not his cup-O-tea, it's okay.

It was just a small project i threw together and i thought the forums would like.

But if any of you could give me an idea of what kind of game i could make with this, that would be great.

Yeah.

Well, there are some exceptions.

But, but, it's made by a fellow kerballer!

I may play it sometime.
